Name: TOKKI
About the game: Fun, casual platformer game with beautiful 1 bit pixel art, nice sharp controls and challenging levels. In this game you control TOKKI. Help him collect all gems in the level and fill the treasure chest to proceed to the next level. Game design, mechanics and in-game abilities: 20+ Levels Beautiful pixel art Engaging music Dash Jump Dash Attack Rewind Hint system Respawns with player ghost system Stamina system Autosave at each new level start Continue from the last level played Combine all game mechanics and abilities to achieve TOKKI's goals.
